title.en: The Prayer of the Ground, Path & Fruition

text.en: Homage to glorious Samantabhadra!
text.en-trans: pal kuntu zangpo la chak tsal lo

text.en: The true nature of things is naturally free of conceptual projections.
text.en-trans: dömé neluk rangzhin trö dangdral

text.en: It does not exist, since even the victorious ones do not see it.
text.en-trans: yöpa mayin gyalwé di ma zik

text.en: Yet neither is it non-existent, as it is the ground of all saṃsāra and nirvāṇa.
text.en-trans: mepa mayin khordé kün gyi zhi

text.en: There is no contradiction here, for it lies beyond the realm of expression.
text.en-trans: galdu mayin jöjé yul lé dé

text.en: May all realize this Great Perfection, the true nature of the ground!
text.en-trans: dzogchen zhi yi neluk tokpar shok

text.en: In essence it is empty, hence free from the limitations of permanence.
text.en-trans: ngowo tongpé takpé ta lé drol

text.en: By nature it is clear, and free from the limitations of nihilism.
text.en-trans: rangzhin salwé chepé mu dangdral

text.en: Its capacity unobstructed, it is the ground of manifold emanations.
text.en-trans: tukjé gakmé natsok trulpé zhi

text.en: It is divided into three, yet in truth there are no such differentiations.
text.en-trans: sum du yé yang dön la ta mi dé

text.en: May all realize this Great Perfection, the true nature of the ground!
text.en-trans: dzogchen zhi yi neluk tokpar shok

text.en: Inconceivable and free of all superimposition, one-sided fixation
text.en-trans: sam gyi mi khyab drondok kün dangdral

text.en: On things being either existent or non-existent completely dissolves.
text.en-trans: yö dang mepé chok dzin nampar zhik

text.en: The full import of this turns back even the tongue of the victors.
text.en-trans: di dön jö la gyalwé jak kyang duk

text.en: Without beginning, middle, or end, it is a great expanse of deep clarity.
text.en-trans: tok ta bar mé tingsal chenpö ying

text.en: May all realize this Great Perfection, the true nature of the ground!
text.en-trans: dzogchen zhi yi neluk tokpar shok

text.en: Its essence is pristine, unoriginated, and primordially pure.
text.en-trans: rang ngo namdak kyemé kadak la

text.en: Whatever manifests is the expression of this unconditioned spontaneous presence.
text.en-trans: lhündrub dümajepé dang sharwa

text.en: Without perceiving them as other, realizing the great unity of awareness-emptiness,
text.en-trans: güdu ma zung riktong zungjuk cher

text.en: One’s understanding of the ground will reach a point of culmination.
text.en-trans: tokpé zhi yi gongpa tsé du chin

text.en: May there be no deviations and mistakes concerning this key point of the path!
text.en-trans: lam gyi né la gol chok mepar shok

text.en: Pure from the beginning, even the term “view” does not exist.
text.en-trans: yené dakpé tawé ming yangmé

text.en: Aware of the original state, the sheath of meditation falls away.
text.en-trans: rang ngo rigpé gom gyü shub né dön

text.en: There are no reference points, hence no need to restrain one’s conduct.
text.en-trans: zaté mepé chöpé drok dangdral

text.en: In the spontaneously present nature, this state of naked simplicity,
text.en-trans: rangzhin lhum zhuk trödral jenpé ngang

text.en: May there be no deviations and mistakes concerning this key point of the path!
text.en-trans: lam gyi né la gol chok mepar shok

text.en: Not falling into partiality towards positive thoughts or negative ones,
text.en-trans: zang ngen namtok chok su ma lhung zhing

text.en: And without giving free rein to a state of indifferent neutrality,
text.en-trans: tangnyom lungmaten du ma jampar

text.en: Manifestation and liberation—an expanse unrestricted, unbridled, and spontaneously free.
text.en-trans: shardrol rimé gya yen lhün jam long

text.en: Understanding that the nature is inherently devoid of needing to accept and reject,
text.en-trans: panglang yé zé rangzhin yong shé ngang

text.en: May there be no deviations and mistakes concerning this key point of the path!
text.en-trans: lam gyi né la gol chok mepar shok

text.en: Like space, awareness is the universal ground and starting point.
text.en-trans: tokmé chi zhi namkha tabü ngang

text.en: Manifest ground spontaneously present, yet vanishing like clouds in the sky,
text.en-trans: zhi nang rigpa kha la trin deng zhin

text.en: The mind radiates out, projecting outwards and then returning within
text.en-trans: chisal shepa nang du dokpa lé

text.en: To the youthful vase body’s inner space, possessing six unique characteristics—
text.en-trans: khyechö drukden zhönnu bumkü bub

text.en: May all seize the throne of this majestic fruition!
text.en-trans: drebü gyalpo tsensa zinpar shok

text.en: From the very beginning, awareness itself is Samantabhadra.
text.en-trans: yené rangrik kuntuzangpo la

text.en: Within it, all hoping for attainments dissolves into the sphere of reality,
text.en-trans: tob jé shendö tadak ying su yal

text.en: The true character of the Great Perfection, beyond intentional effort;
text.en-trans: jatsol lodé dzokpa chenpö shi

text.en: The sphere of reality and awareness, the inner space of Samantabhadrī—
text.en-trans: yingrik kuntuzangmö kha long bub

text.en: May all seize the throne of this majestic fruition!
text.en-trans: drebü gyalpo tsensa zinpar shok

text.en: Utterly non-abiding—the nature of the Great Middle Way;
text.en-trans: rabtu miné uma chenpö dön

text.en: All-embracing and spontaneously vast—the state of Mahāmudrā;
text.en-trans: khyab dal lhün jam chakgya chenpö ngang

text.en: Freed from limitations and wide open—the key point of the Great Perfection.
text.en-trans: ta drol long yang dzokpa chenpö né

text.en: The virtues of the levels and paths fundamentally complete—spontaneously present inner space.
text.en-trans: salam yönten zhir dzok lhündrub bub

text.en: May all seize the throne of this majestic fruition!
text.en-trans: drebü gyalpo tsensa zinpar shok
